casebody.data:
BRUNSON
v.
N.C. DEPT. OF HUMAN RESOURCES, et al. 403P18-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. May 9, 2019

Daniel P. O'Brien, Special Deputy Attorney General, For N.C. Dept. of Human Resources

Jonathan E. Brunson, For Brunson, Jonathan E.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 21st of November 2018 by Plaintiff to Withdraw Petition for Discretionary Review:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 9th of May 2019."
